text: Christopher Kuper (born December 19, 1982 in Anchorage, Alaska) is an American football Offensive guard for the Denver Broncos of the National Football League (NFL). Kuper played college football at the University of North Dakota and was drafted by the Denver Broncos with the 161st pick in the fifth round of the 2006 NFL Draft. ==Other websites== *Chris Kuper at denverbroncos.com Category:1982 births Category:Living people Kuper, Chris Category:American football offensive guards Category:Sportspeople from Anchorage, Alaska Category:Sportspeople from North Dakota
title: Chris Kuper
